author: cframpton
msg: - Remove  properties/mustella_tmp.properties since it is a temp file which shouldn't be in the repository.

- Remove local.properties.  If you need local.properties you should copy local-template.properties to local.properties and edit it but you should not need it if you have the usual air and player environment variables set up and you want to run the tests using the player.  If you want to run the tests using air either set use_apollo=true in local.properties or invoke mini_run.sh -addAntArg=-Duse_apollo=true.
- Ignore the results.txt and failures.txt files.
- If you want to clean the results of the mustella run you can invoke ant clean in the mustella directory.  mini_run.sh does this before every run.
